mapper.insert: INSERT INTO backsight(writer, content, title, b_like, regdate) VALUES (#{writer}, #{content}, #{title}, #{b_like}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT b.back_no, b.writer, b.content, b.title, b.b_like, now() as "REGDATE", u.v_email, u.v_name FROM userinfo u, backsight b WHERE b.writer = u.v_id ORDER BY b.back_no DESC
